comments.body:
I just realized this can be simplified, although I can also see why you might want to keep it as-is:

```suggestion
if sys.version_info < (3, 7):
```

Aren't these superfluous? The appropriate method will be called for each instance so you can just do
```suggestion
return self.data < string
```
Same for `__le__`, `__gt__`, etc.

Everything after line 153 is a direct copy from `collections.UserString` and then modified to use `AnsibleVaultEncryptedUnicode` instead of `UserString` in isinstance calls, and to ensure they don't rewrap with `self.__class__`.
